title: France panorama. [No. 72/26]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Exports and imports - France’s principal clients and purveyors. Parc des Princes - the new Paris Stadium finals of the French Soccer Cup. 2. The reading machine - an electronic reader. 3. World Book Year - The Nice Book Festival. 4. The arts: Francois Brochet - Brochet’s wooden sculptures. Claude de Soria - stone and bronze sculptures.
